services.title: Service 1
services.description: Small portraits (yes I do pet portraits as well!) rendered in pencil, fully shaded. Dimensions range from 5"x7" to 8"x10". Background elements = extra charge.

services.title: Service 2
services.description: Small colored pencil portraits (yes I do pet portraits as well)! Dimensions range from 5"x7" to 8"x10". Background elements = extra charge.

services.title: Service 3
services.description: Small watercolor/gouache portraits (yes I do pet portraits as well!) Dimensions range from 5"x7" to 8"x10". Background elements = extra charge.

services.title: Service 4
services.description:
Small to large scale paintings. I offer only acrylic paintings in this service at this time. Message
me or email @SkyleeLPerkins@gmail.com to inquire about price,
duration, and subject matter.

services.title: Service 5
services.description: Line work with varying line weights. Portraiture or tattoo designs.
